name: Wonder Project J2
description: Wonder Project J2: Corlo no Mori no Josette (ワンダープロジェクト J2 コルロの森のジョゼット, lit. "Wonder Project J2: Josette of the Corlo Forest") is a Japan-exclusive Bishōjo and raising simulation game developed by Givro and published by Enix for the Nintendo 64 in 1996. It is the sequel to Wonder Project J: Kikai no Shōnen Pīno, and was packaged with a game themed Controller Pak.
